short_summary: Supply and delivery of one combine harvester, one straight-cut header and one pick-up header.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: 01634-240173 Combine Harvester with Headers

## Tender Details

*Reference Number:* 0261223723 Doc8621683
*Publication Date:* January 16, 2024
*Closing Date:* March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*Amendment Date:* February 26, 2024

## Tender Overview

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of a combine harvester and headers. The required equipment includes:

* One (1) Combine Harvester
* One (1) Straight-cut header
* One (1) Pick-up header

## Delivery and Security Requirements

The delivery point is located at the AAFC-MRDC, #101 Route 100, Morden, MB, R6M 1Y5, with no security requirements associated with this solicitation.

## Trade Agreements and Procurement Category

This tender is in compliance with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

The procurement category for this tender is Open – Competitive Bidding.

## Evaluation Criteria

* The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through Ariba Discovery at the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18531629?extsite=MTg1MzE2MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18531629?extsite=MTg1MzE2MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:

Meegan Carlson (elle-la / she-her)
(Son travail/Her role) - Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [meegan.carlson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:meegan.carlson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: Please disregard the old Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required
